name: singing

A2 the activity of making musical sounds with the voice, usually a tune with words: We could hear singing in the next room. a singing voice/lesson/teacher See
sing
More examplesFewer examplesHe enjoys singing and dancing.She began her singing career at the age of seven.Her singing was dubbed for the film.choral singingIn most bird species, singing is the job of the male.
